programme.title: Incredible Tales S6
programme.desc: Short supernatural stories that are inspired by popular beliefs or myths in Singapore and in the region.

programme.title: Blood & Treasure
programme.desc: Danny and Lexi must improvise in order to stay alive and out of jail when they're stuck in Casablanca with both law enforcement and their enemies hot on their trail. Also, Hardwick's personal investigation into the Brotherhood of Serapis lands him in a dangerous situation.

programme.title: Britain's Got Talent - The Champions
programme.desc: A British talent competition series, featuring a variety of winners, finalists, and other successful or notable participants from past seasons.

programme.title: The Wonderful World Of Baby Animals
programme.desc: Take an inside look at the most important and experimental months of newborn animals' lives. Experience the trials, tribulations and triumphs. See what they get up to when no-one's watching. And find out what drives their joyous - and sometimes strange - behaviour.

programme.title: The Titan Games
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson presents and stars in The Titan Games, a groundbreaking new athletic competition based on Dwayne's belief that within each and every one of us is the potential for greatness.

programme.title: Open Homes S3
programme.desc: Mike heads down to the Sydney beaches to visit a beachside renovation with all the bells and whistles, we see a kitchen tip and recipe anyone can do at home. We finish up in the prestigious Byron bay to visit a multi million dollar award winning home.

programme.title: Food Chase
programme.desc: Alan Wan, Yuslina Yussof, James Kumar, and Oon Shu An are taking on Food Chase in Beach Road. While the cast from The Cheaters App may not doing any cheating today, one team will definitely be downing The Drink.

programme.title: Teddies
programme.desc: The Teddies set out on a wild imaginative adventure where a large cardboard box becomes a boat, a giant friendly Panda, and a treasure chest. It's Teddy Games Day! The Teddies pair up to compete in a Pillow Case Race, a Blind Teddy Obstacle Course and Double Dance-nastics.

programme.title: Hiccup And Sneeze S2
programme.desc: Hiccup is excited about setting up her own cafe, but soon discovers that being a chef, waitress, cleaner and entertainer all at the same time - may be a little too much to handle!

programme.title: Tumble Leaf S4
programme.desc: Tumble Leaf is set in a whimsical land where a small blue fox named Fig plays each day and discovers adventure, friendship and love around every bend in the path.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2
programme.desc: Travelling the world with their teacher, mentor and friend Ubercorn, a disco-grooving unicorn, the Go Jetters are fixing the mishaps caused by the mischievous meddlings of Grandmaster Glitch in new locations including Central Park in New York, Machu Picchu, China, Japan, Mali, and Petra in Jordan. And now we get to know our plucky international heroes, Xuli, Kyan, Lars and Foz even better, as Series 2 takes us to the top-secret island home of the Go Jet Academy to see them intraining.

programme.title: Pororo the Little Penguin S7
programme.desc: Pororo is a Little Penguin with big dreams! He lives on a tiny island with his friends Eddy the Fox, Loopy the Beaver, Poby the Polar Bear, and Crong the Dinosaur to name a few and they planned for the best fun ever in this new season.

programme.title: 123 Number Squad S1
programme.desc: The Number Squad goes on a musical journey to locate a magic shell that will help give Shelly back her beautiful voice, but they need to solve number puzzles along the way to retrieve the shell. Shelly is about to hold a concert for her clam friends when a sneezing frenzy causes them to fly everywhere! The Number Squad finds ways to bring the clams back and to minimize the sneezing at the concert.

programme.title: Super Wings S5: Super Pets
programme.desc: Jett delivers some special movie making equipment to a boy named Riley who's visiting an alien themed festival in Argentina. Riley wants to be a film director and his dream is to make an alien movie so he's here hoping to find the best costumed person for his movie.

programme.title: The Deep S4
programme.desc: The Nektons help locate a legendary Singaporean glass cabinet, but discover it's guarded by a terrifying and familiar creature! Last time, they barely escaped with their lives! Will they be as lucky this time around?

programme.title: Power Players
programme.desc: Axel is sick of being the nice, enthusiastic little boy that everyone likes. He dreams of being an unsung hero, cold and lonesome... much cooler, if you ask him!

programme.title: Puberteens
programme.desc: Mike is showered with attention as the ambassador of the popular Pim & Pop juice drink - the Mega Mangosteen Mix! However, he soon discovers that the school's favorite drink harbours a delicious, dark secret.

programme.title: Puberteens
programme.desc: Following the Pim & Pop debacle, the Puberteens have become the public enemy. Celeste takes it upon herself to single-handedly rehiblitate the Puberteens' image, and encounters a nemesis of old.

programme.title: Marblegen
programme.desc: In a world where marble play has become one of the most popular sports, Marblegens tournaments, magical marbles with extraordinary powers, are all the rage. Forming the Meteor team, Assa, Cosmo, Luna and Sam decided to participate in the Olympia MARBLEGAMES, one of the biggest tournaments on the planet! Their objective: to prevent the terrible Marcellus King from seizing the powerful Mercury ball, a reward offered to the winners.

programme.title: OddBods S3
programme.desc: The OddBods return for a new season of fun and laughter!

programme.title: Ok-to Try
programme.desc: Follow our Try-ers as they learn balloon sculpting from the Master and attempt to break the world record for the longest balloon chain! The fear of balloons popping is large in this one, so brace yourself!

programme.title: 44 Cats - First Series
programme.desc: The Buffycats find a plastic dinosaur in the garden. Pilou wants to play with it, so they go to the park. But the dinosaur starts playing all sorts of pranks on them, and the inventor cat Edison tells them it's not just a simple toy...

programme.title: DC Super Hero Girls: Intergalactic Games
programme.desc: Facing off against Korguar Academy and the Female Furies, can the Super Hero High team bring home the championship? Let the games and the action begin!

programme.title: Kong - King Of The Apes
programme.desc: After Commissioner Decker fails to find Kong in the redwoods, Richard transfers the reluctant Botila's consciousness into a T-Rex body to create the ultimate fighting (and deforestation) machine and lure the ape out. As Kong contends against Botila-Zilla, Richard & Lukas have a showdown at their old family home.

programme.title: 100 Wishes S2
programme.desc: A fresh twist on the Genie lore, 100 Wishes is a heartwarming comedy series in the style of LILO & STITCH and MONSTERS INC.

programme.title: Masterchef Junior USA S6
programme.desc: MasterChef Junior is an American cooking competition involving children from the ages of 8 to 13. The sixth season returns with chefs Gordon Ramsay and Christina Tosi acting as the judges, along Joe Bastianich as the third judge.

programme.title: Survivor 42
programme.desc: Jeff Probst returns to Fiji to host the latest season of Survivor with an all-new group of contestants.

programme.title: Little Big Shots S4
programme.desc: In a completely reimagined new season, Melissa McCarthy meets with some of the most inspiring and hilarious kids from all corners of the globe.

programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid S5
programme.desc: Returning season of the classic game show, hosted by Michael Strahan. With the help of their game partners, contestants paired with celebrities must guess words or phrases that appear on the show's pyramid-shaped gameboard to win money.

programme.title: Just for Laughs Gags S21
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: A war-hardened Crusader and his Moorish commander mount an audacious revolt against the corrupt English crown.

programme.title: News Tonight

programme.title: MasterChef Singapore S3
programme.desc: Contestants get a taste of the high life with some of the finest ingredients. But first, a produce quiz lets one home cook choose how to split the top 6 into pairs. Each team gets assigned two premium proteins to be starred in a luxurious two course meal. The higher the team places in Round 1, the more time they get when competing as individuals in the fiery elimination challenge where they must cook a sweet and savoury dish showcasing the ingredient hidden in a mini-Mystery Box.

programme.title: Dawn To Dusk
programme.desc: Mother's Day on the Indian subcontinent means the beginning of the dry season in Sri-Lanka and the end of it in India. For a mother Bengal tiger, it's time to train her cubs to hunt, while lions and cobras get serious about mating season.

programme.title: Earth's Tropical Islands
programme.desc: The extraordinary wildlife, landscapes and people of the Amazon, the world's greatest river. From boiling streams and transparent lagoons, to pink river dolphins and riotous river carnivals, its great size hides spectacular secrets.

programme.title: Grizzy & The Lemmings S2

Grizzy, who wishes to recover his couch, tries to straighten up, but is driven out by their fencing foils. To retaliate, Grizzy must find a blade equal to the task. He opts for a fine... frozen swordfish!

programme.title: Films & Stars

programme.title: Famous Foodies

programme.title: Tanglin
programme.desc: Succumbing to the pressure from his army mates and reluctant to lose face, Eddie lies that he's succeeded in doing it with Xiao Wei, but Julius and Mark suspect otherwise.

programme.title: David Rocco's Dolce South East Asia
programme.desc: The Vietnam War forced many Vietnamese families to flee Saigon for other parts of the world. Their children are often referred to as Viet-Kieu, people of Vietnamese descent who grew up outside of Vietnam. David explores the incredible food scene of this dynamic city and meets a few Viet-Kiew who have now returned to their ancestral home, looking for new opportunities that are now available in the new Saigon.

programme.title: Donal's Super Food In Minutes
programme.desc: Donal Skehan is the thinking chef's chef. In this highly watchable series, he shows us how to create quick, easy, delicious meals inspired by global cuisine and bursting with flavour. Admired by renowned chefs like Nigella Lawson and Jamie Oliver for his creative, innovative approach to cooking, Donal focuses on everyday cooking, using ten ingredients or less and never spending more than thirty minutes on a meal. With an emphasis on ease, health and flavour he uses pared-back kitchen skills.

programme.title: Rachel Khoo's Cosmopolitan Cook
programme.desc: Passionate and creative cook Rachel Khoo goes in search of new ideas in this vibrant and fascinating series. Rachel travels to some of the most beautiful foodie countries in the world, heading for cosmopolitan locations both urban and rural to get inspiration for dinner parties with her friends back home. Rachel gets under the skin of the local cuisine, showing two very different culinary influences, such as Barcelona and rural Spain, or in Italy, Naples and the Amalfi coast.

programme.desc: 1949, the Japanese Occupation is over, Singapore has returned to British control, but the people are still struggling to pick up the pieces of their lives. 19 year-old Elizabeth Lee (Cheryl Wee) has just finished her Senior Cambridge exams and her mother, Yoke Lien (Aileen Tan) gives her two choices: find a job or get married. However, Elizabeth's gets into a scuffle with gangsters, catching the attention of secret society member Lim Seng Hock (Daren Tan) and British officer Henry Ridley.

programme.desc: Kanmani tries to convince her mother about the potential of making a living as a social media influencer, but the ever-traditional Sakoonthala is not keen on the idea, confiding in her husband that she wants to protect their daughter. Kanmani is insistent, and films her first online video. Meanwhile, their second child Kannan is going through growing pains, and has an embarrassing close shave that Kaargemam tries to coach him through. #CIDSakoo #madeforyou.

programme.title: Thiruvai Malarvai S2
